00057 #include "MainWindow.h"

00064 FieldContainerWidget::FieldContainerWidget( SoFieldContainer* fieldContainer, QString containerName, QWidget* parent )
00065 : m_pFieldContainer( fieldContainer ), m_pModel ( 0 ), m_containerName( containerName )
00066 {
00067         
00068     m_ptreeView = new QTreeView;
00069     m_ptreeView->setAlternatingRowColors( true ); 
00070     connect (m_ptreeView, SIGNAL(doubleClicked ( const QModelIndex& ) ), this, SLOT( EditorOpened( const QModelIndex& ) ) );
00071     
00072 
00073         ParametersDelegate* delegate = new ParametersDelegate( );         
00074     m_ptreeView->setItemDelegate( delegate );
00075     connect (delegate, SIGNAL( closeEditor( QWidget* ) ), this, SLOT( EditorClosed( QWidget* ) ) );
00076     
00077     QVBoxLayout* mainLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00078     mainLayout->addWidget( m_ptreeView );
00079     setLayout( mainLayout );
00080     
00081     m_pModel = new ParametersModel();
00082     m_pModel->SetEditable( true );
00083     m_pModel->setHorizontalHeaderLabels( QStringList() << tr("Parameter") << tr("Value") );
00084         m_ptreeView->setModel(m_pModel);
00085         
00086     if( m_pFieldContainer ) ReadFields( );
00087 }
00088 
00089 void FieldContainerWidget::ReadFields( )
00090 {
00091     SoFieldList fieldList;  
00092     int totalFields = m_pFieldContainer->getFields( fieldList );
00093     
00094     SoField* pField = 0; 
00095     SbName fieldName;
00096     SbString fieldValue = "null";
00097     
00098         for( int index = 0; index < totalFields; index++ )
00099         {
00100                 pField = fieldList.get( index );
00101                 if( pField )
00102                 {       
00103                 pField->get( fieldValue );
00104             if( m_pFieldContainer->getFieldName( pField, fieldName ) )
00105             {
00106                                 m_pModel->setItem( index, false, new ParametersItem ( QString(fieldName.getString()), false, pField ));
00107                                 ParametersItem* valueItem = new ParametersItem ( QString(fieldValue.getString()), true, pField );
00108                                 m_pModel->setItem( index, true, valueItem );
00109             }
00110                 }
00111         }
00112 }
00113 
00114 void FieldContainerWidget::SetEditable( bool editable )
00115 {
00116         Trace trace( "FieldContainerWidget::SetEditable", false );
00117         
00118         m_pModel->SetEditable( editable );
00119 }
00120 
00121 void FieldContainerWidget::EditorOpened( const QModelIndex& index )
00122 {
00123         Trace trace( "FieldContainerWidget::EditorOpened", false );
00124         m_lastEditingIndex = index;
00125 }
00126 
00127 void FieldContainerWidget::EditorClosed(  QWidget* editor )
00128 {
00129         Trace trace( "FieldContainerWidget::EditorClosed", false );
00130         
00131         QString newValue;
00132         SoField* field = m_pModel->ModelItem( m_lastEditingIndex )->GetField();
00133         if( field->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoSFEnum::getClassTypeId() ) )
00134         {
00135                 QComboBox* combo = static_cast<QComboBox *>(editor);
00136                 newValue = combo->currentText( );
00137 
00138         }
00139         else
00140         {
00141                 QLineEdit  *textEdit = dynamic_cast<QLineEdit *>(editor);
00142                 newValue = textEdit->text();
00143         }
00144         
00145         SoFieldList fieldList; 
00146         int numFields = m_pFieldContainer->getFields (fieldList);
00147         
00148         QStringList* oldValuesList = new QStringList;
00149         
00150         for(int num = 0; num < numFields; num++ )
00151         {
00152                 SbString indexValue;
00153                 fieldList[num]->get( indexValue );
00154                 oldValuesList->append( QString(indexValue.getString() ) );
00155         }
00156          
00157         m_pModel->setData(m_lastEditingIndex, newValue, Qt::UserRole);
00158         
00159         emit valueModificated( *oldValuesList, m_containerName );
00160 }
00161 
00162 void FieldContainerWidget::Reset()
00163 {
00164         m_ptreeView->reset();
00165 }
